data.text: @sevenzinnia @harmlesskarl @Molson_Hart OMG? That’s nice and my apologies, I think it’s so trouble, but I don’t have any overseas parcel, my apologies
@JaneZha59357438 @harmlesskarl @Molson_Hart Surprised. I received 1-2 packages a month and the only calls is when they want me to pay the customs tax.
@JaneZha59357438 @Molson_Hart There are no restrictions on receiving a package from abroad. Anywhere in China.
@sevenzinnia @Molson_Hart Have you checked you local policy?

@harmlesskarl @Molson_Hart You don’t how long it stops in the customs areas (extra money), you don’t know how many files you should say, even all done, all kinds of calls checking your family healthy status. And my area has encouraged not receiving the overseas parcels.
@Molson_Hart Does it hurt their social credit if they accept it? Turns their green light to yellow for Covid alerts ?
@Molson_Hart Tell them there are sensitive IP secrets from US big tech companies inside the package... They'll open it.
@Molson_Hart Time for a new supplier! Haha just shipped some wiring samples to my plastic supplier in Shenzhen had no issues.
@Molson_Hart Send it to me and I'll send them domestically then it won't be a package from abroad :)))
